item.title: Fly tipping inside the car park of Whitgift House SE11 6AG near the green recycling bins, 3rd December
item.description:
Illegal fly-tipping inside our car park, specifically next to the green recycling bin located inside the car park of Whitgift House Whitgift Street, SE11 6AG This matter has become urgent. The dumped rubbish is not only unsightly and unlawful, but it also poses a significant trip hazard. We have already experienced an accident involving a resident, directly related to the obstructive waste. This situation is unacceptable in a managed residential area. We remind Lambeth Council of its obligation to keep public and communal areas safe, clean, and free from hazardous waste. We therefore request immediate removal of the fly-tipped materials and appropriate monitoring or enforcement to prevent further occurrences. If this issue is not resolved promptly, we will have no choice but to escalate this matter as a formal complaint

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Whitgift Street, Lambeth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The first drain on the rhs as you enter Venture Close is completely blocked solid. No water can drain here. This means that at times of heavy rain, as on 2 Dec, the next drain outside no. 11 lis inundated with a flow it cannot manage and water floods the road., 3rd December
item.description:
Please unblock the drain. NB I have reported this problem on this site previously. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Venture Close, Albany Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Area not cleaned for over 2 weeks, 3rd December
item.description:
The lack of regular maintenance is becoming increasingly noticeable and is creating an unpleasant and unsanitary environment for residents. Rubbish is piling up, and the environment is becoming unpleasant and unsanitary. This neglect is unacceptable.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Livermere Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
